desc: Changes a sprite to the batch.

args.name: id
args.desc: The index of the sprite to change.

args.name: x
args.desc: The x position of the new sprite.

args.name: y
args.desc: The y position of the new sprite.

args.name: r
args.desc: The rotation of the new sprite.

args.name: sx
args.desc: The x scale of the new sprite.

args.name: sy
args.desc: The y scale of the new sprite.

args.name: ox
args.desc: The x origin offset of the new sprite.

args.name: oy
args.desc: The y origin offset of the new sprite.

args.name: kx
args.desc: The x shear factor of the new sprite.

args.name: ky
args.desc: The y shear factor of the new sprite.

note: The function returns the spritebatch object itself, so it can be used for chain calls.
